camel.source.path.groupName.name: camel.source.path.groupName
camel.source.path.groupName.description: The name of the cluster group to use

camel.source.path.consumerEndpointUri.name: camel.source.path.consumerEndpointUri
camel.source.path.consumerEndpointUri.description: The consumer endpoint to use in master/slave mode

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.zookeeper-master.bridgeE.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.zookeeper-master.bridgeE.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.zookeeper-master.maximum.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.maximumConnectionTimeout
camel.component.zookeeper-master.maximum.description: Timeout in millis to use when connecting to the zookeeper ensemble

camel.component.zookeeper-master.zkRoot.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zkRoot
camel.component.zookeeper-master.zkRoot.description: The root path to use in zookeeper where information is stored which nodes are master/slave etc. Will by default use: /camel/zookeepermaster/clusters/master

camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeep.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeeperUrl
camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeep.description: The url for the zookeeper ensemble

camel.component.zookeeper-master.basicPr.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.zookeeper-master.basicPr.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.zookeeper-master.contain.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.containerIdFactory
camel.component.zookeeper-master.contain.description: To use a custom ContainerIdFactory for creating container ids.

camel.component.zookeeper-master.curator.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.curator
camel.component.zookeeper-master.curator.description: To use a custom configured CuratorFramework as connection to zookeeper ensemble.

camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeep.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeeperPassword
camel.component.zookeeper-master.zooKeep.description: The password to use when connecting to the zookeeper ensemble
